description: Well's Special Hinoki Falsecypress (Chamaecyparis obtusa 'Well's Special') is an incredible conifer that is extremely showy and outstanding in the landscape. It boasts a narrow, pyramidal form with white-tipped foliage, giving it an exciting overall appearance. All year round, its dark green needles maintain their reflective beauty and contrast nicely with the glossy copper-colored bark. Its moderate growth rate only adds to its appeal, making it perfect for hedges and windbreaks. Its hardy nature also makes it resistant to disease, insect, and drought. Its aromatic foliage is especially noteworthy and looks stunning as a centerpiece in any garden.
